publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4413 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Broadband Access Across Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on the roll-out of broadband across Scotland but urges the Executive to accelerate the investment in technical solutions to connect the small percentage of communities that still await the provision of a broadband service.

S2M-4413 Broadband Access Across Scotland (lodged on 17 May 2006) Mr John Swinney*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Maureen Macmillan*, Trish Godman*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mike Pringle*, Sarah Boyack*

S2M-4413 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Broadband Access Across Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on the roll-out of broadband across Scotland but urges the Executive to accelerate the investment in technical solutions to connect the small percentage of communities that still await the provision of a broadband service. Supported by: Mr John Swinney, Roseanna Cunningham, Jackie Baillie, Dr Elaine Murray, Maureen Macmillan, Trish Godman, Bruce Crawford, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mike Pringle, Sarah Boyack, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4413 Broadband Access Across Scotland (lodged on 17 May 2006) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-4413 Broadband Access Across Scotland (lodged on 17 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4413 Broadband Access Across Scotland (lodged on 17 May 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4413 Broadband Access Across Scotland (lodged on 17 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4413 Broadband Access Across Scotland (lodged on 17 May 2006) Cathy Peattie*
